definition: gall bladder/courage/guts/gall/inner container (e.g. bladder of a football, inner container of a thermos)
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: You are monstrously audacious, how dare you misappropriate public funds?
sentences.chinese: 你真是狗膽包天，公家的錢也敢挪用？
